text: wqal shueayb liqawmih mstdrkana: qad akhtlqna ealaa allah alkadhib 'iin eudna 'iilaa dinakum baed 'an anqdhna allah mnh, walays lana 'an natahawal 'iilaa ghyr din rabana 'iilaa 'an yasha' allah rbna, waqad wasie rabuna kula shay' elmana, fyelm ma yuslih llebad, ealaa allah wahdah aetmadna hdayt wnsrt, rabana ahkum baynana wabayn qawmina balhq, wa'ant khayr alhakmyn
